name: Killer Rabbit
description:
This is my first ever game! Do you dare to enter the lair of the killer rabbit!? This game is heavily inspired by the killer rabbit scene from Monty Python and the Quest for the Holy Grail. 

Gameplay

  • Arrow keys move you
  • z and x jump and throw swords
  • If you touch a rabbit, or it touches you, you die
  • If you run into a Holy Hand Grenade, all current rabbits die
  • If you get to the Holy Grail you win
  • If a rabbit hops twice it spawns another rabbit, kill them quickly!

I have not yet beaten it, let me know in the comments if you do!

ToDos:

  1. Fix that one spot in the music that seems to be off / garbage
  2. Cap the number of rabbits in total and kill those on the bottom level when you aren't there as well.
  3. Add coconut noise for movement
  4. Add serf carrying baggage and coconuts
  5. Add lady of the lake to toss out swords
  6. Generally make it better
  7. Un-spaghetify the codebase

Credits:

  • Zeldo, for the music
  • mhughsonfor laying down some groundwork for me to learn from
